name: Skautfold: Usurper
description: Usurper is a Metroidvania Action-RPG. With Eldritch horrors having been unleashed by the outer-worldly Citadel, your job is to rid London of its terrors. Use the new "Guard" system that rewards skillful play and accuracy, to uncover the massive structure and defeat the nightmares lurking within.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service pack 3 Processor: 1.2 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB RAM on Desktop, 1GB on certain Laptops. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: The game produces unreliable performance on Laptops due to integrated video chips, a home computer is recommended. Widescreen capable monitor required.
